long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meeting Recording & Automation :
SAM.Coach Chrome Extension automatically records meetings, generates summaries, and provides insights without needing a bot in the meeting. 

Record any meeting even if you are not the meeting organizer.  
Start recording anytime during a meeting with one click, detecting virtual meeting links from your browser or calendar to ensure nothing is missed. 
Record in-person meetings with SAM.Coach mobile app.

Calendar Integration:
SAM auto-syncs with multiple calendars, displaying all meetings in one place. 
Users can launch and record meetings directly in the browser using the SAM Chrome Extension. 

Compatibility:
Compatible with all browser-based meetings, including Zoom, Teams, and Google Meet. 

Transcription & Summaries:
Audio is automatically uploaded for transcription and summary generation. 
Switch between different meeting summary formats based on the meeting type. SAM generates the most suitable summary for each context. 

AI-Powered Insights & Actions:
Use "ASK SAM" to ask questions about the meeting, and SAM AI will analyze the entire conversation to provide the most appropriate answers. 

Create tasks directly from the meeting summary to ensure no action items are missed. 
SAM not only summarizes discussions but also helps users understand the context and meaning behind what was said. 

Record meetings seamlessly, even offline. SAM's Chrome Extension saves audio locally when disconnected and uploads automatically when back online. Never lose a word, in-person or virtual.
